news_header: Hamas may release remaining Israeli hostages during ceasefire's second phase; negotiations ongoing.
news_original_title: Hamas: Vapautamme kaikki jäljellä olevat panttivangit Gazan tulitauon toisessa vaiheessa
news_text: At least 58 Israeli hostages remain in Gaza. Hamas indicates it will release them all at once in the second phase of the ceasefire. Negotiations continue.
